short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strophe - make newtab a place for your thoughts and notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Strophe is a simple yet functional newtab extension for Chrome.

It features nothing but a single-page note that will be open on a "newtab". 

You can write down your thoughts, ideas, or anything you want to remember. 

Strophe supports rich content too, namely:
- text formatting (bold, italic, links)
- lists and checkboxes
- headings 
- images and links
- and many-many other things

The content is saved automatically to your local storage, so you can close the tab and come back to it later.

Source code is provided under MIT license here - https://github.com/renardeinside/strophe
